title: Create CraftyMini landing page with product categories and Order Now form (email/Instagram)

requirements.text: Build a responsive CraftyMini single-page marketing/landing experience that introduces the brand, showcases the main crochet product categories (Baby Booties, Hair Crochet Clips, Crochet Bow, Crochet Purse, Custom), and includes clear ordering and contact information.

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page includes sections: Hero/intro, Browse Our Collection (category grid), Why Choose CraftyMini, Order Now, Contact Us, Footer.
All user-facing text is in English.
Layout is responsive for mobile, tablet, and desktop (no horizontal scrolling; cards and form reflow appropriately).

requirements.text: Implement a clear 'Order Now' flow: add an Order Now button that scrolls to an order form collecting Name, Phone Number, Address, Item Name/Design, Category (Baby Booties / Hair Crochet Clip / Crochet Bow / Crochet Purse / Custom), Size, Color, Quantity, and an optional Notes field.

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking Order Now scrolls/focuses to the order form section.
Order form contains all fields listed in the requirement with appropriate input types (e.g., phone input, quantity numeric).
Category field is a select/dropdown with the exact options: Baby Booties, Hair Crochet Clip, Crochet Bow, Crochet Purse, Custom.
Basic validation: required fields cannot be empty; quantity must be >= 1.

requirements.text: Establish and apply a coherent visual theme for CraftyMini (colors, typography, spacing, buttons, cards) suitable for a handmade/craft brand, and enforce it consistently across all sections without using a blue/purple primary palette.
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is applied consistently to headings, body text, buttons, form controls, and cards.
Primary palette is not blue/purple (unless used only as a minor accent).
UI looks intentional and cohesive on both mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Add the required static images to the frontend and render them from frontend/public/assets/generated (no backend image routing).
acceptanceCriteria: All required images listed in imageRequirements.required exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the UI.
Images are optimized for web display (reasonable file sizes) and include alt text where applicable.

constraints: Frontend must not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed by the platform.
Use only Internet Identity if authentication is later added; no third-party auth integrations (not required for this build).
No external databases or third-party backend services.
nonGoals: Implementing online payments or payment processing.
